content: ***this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** the rosemary green baby bonnet is the counterpart to my lavender blue baby bonnet released earlier this month filled with rich earthy hues flowers and lacy stitches this bonnet speaks of forest adventures and the woodsy smell of mosses and leaves a delicate ribbon tie adds to the vintage charm **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 2 75mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge one of my testers needed to use a 4mm hook 100-150 yards of loops and threads woolike sock/fingering yarn in sage scissors yarn needle or ribbon needle 1 yard of 1/4 or 3/8 ribbon fray check or clear nail polish **stitches used ** slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet **additional terms ** v_stitch in the stitch mentioned double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet then continue following the instructions as written **gauge ** 26 stitches in 4 or 3 1/4 across after round 9 **measurements ** 0-3 months 5 by 5 using fingering/sock yarn and 2 75mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge
